title: What accessories are included with my HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0?
answer:
Standard in-box accessories are the power adapter, data/charging cable, OTG cable, and card eject tool.

Optional accessories are the slip cover, protective cover, protective film, and portable support stand.

Your HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0 is also compatible with in-car chargers, power banks, Bluetooth speakers, microSD cards, and Bluetooth headsets
